{{n5-section-equipment}}


This indicates that the Trooper has an automated memory recording and storage device, commonly known as a Cube. 

Troopers with a Cube are easier to heal. Additionally, Cube-wearing casualties can potentially be recovered for use in future missions. 

{{update | PDF 5.2, October 2025}}
{{erratahighlight}}There are two different types of Cubes. 
{{erratahighlight-end}}

{{image | name=cube.png | style=128inline }}
{{css_skillbox |black| CUBE  | AUTOMATIC EQUIPMENT  }}
{{effects}}
* When using the [[Doctor]] Special Skill (or other Special Skills or pieces of Equipment that explicitly say so) to heal a Trooper with a Cube, you can expend [[Command Token]]s to re-roll a failed [[WIP]] Roll. 
{{css_skillbox-end}}



{{image | name=cube-2.png | style=128inline }}
{{css_skillbox |black| CUBE 2.0  | AUTOMATIC EQUIPMENT  }}
{{effects}}
* When using the [[Doctor]] Special Skill (or other Special Skills or pieces of Equipment that explicitly say so) to heal a Trooper with a Cube {{erratahighlight}}2.0{{erratahighlight-end}}, you can expend [[Command Token]]s to re-roll a failed [[WIP]] Roll. 
* {{erratahighlight}}The user applies a +2 MOD to their [[Saving Roll]] when making a Saving Roll against an Attack with [[Sepsitor]] or Sepsitor Plus.{{erratahighlight-end}}
{{css_skillbox-end}}
{{update-end}}
